attributes.additional_details: Open race tracks for spectators,it is outside and perfectly safe. People can also sit in cars. There is plenty of room to social distance. It is not fair that golf courses can open,people can play football and other sports. The motorsport industry is being discriminated against.
attributes.background: Golf courses and football are allowed to happen,but motorsport spectating at our local track is not allowed. It is outside with plenty of room to social distance. It was allowed last year,why are events being cancelled now?
